product_name: Merrell Mix Master Maze Sport Shoes- Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: For warm-weather trips across trails and streams, the Merrell Mix Master Maze Sport Shoes shield your feet from debris without letting them overheat with extremely breathable coverage. Breathable mesh uppers with synthetic leather overlays offer flexible support and drain water quickly. Single-pull lace adjustments with rip-and-stick closures provide a perfect fit. EVA midsoles offer all-day cushioning and support; textured, non-slip footbeds with Aegis(R) antimicrobial treatment resist odor. Durable rubber outsoles on the Merrell Mix Master Maze Sport Shoes offer great traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: For warm-weather trips across trails and streams, the Merrell Mix Master Maze Sport Shoes shield your feet from debris without letting them overheat with extremely breathable coverage.
